mapper.select: SELECT s.genre, (SELECT artist FROM artist WHERE no=s.artist_no) AS artist, (SELECT album FROM album WHERE no=album_no) AS album, (SELECT img_real FROM album WHERE no=album_no) AS album_img, (SELECT reldate FROM album WHERE no=album_no) AS reldate, (SELECT info FROM album WHERE no=album_no) AS info, (SELECT no FROM album WHERE no=album_no) AS album_no FROM song AS s where album_no=#{album_no} GROUP BY album_no=#{album_no}
SELECT no AS artist_no, artist, debdate, info, img_real FROM artist WHERE no=#{no};

SELECT s.title, s.lyrics, (SELECT artist FROM artist WHERE no=s.artist_no) AS artist, (SELECT album FROM album WHERE no=album_no) AS album, (SELECT img_real FROM album WHERE no=album_no) AS album_img FROM song AS s where album_no=#{album_no}

SELECT s.title, s.lyrics, (SELECT artist FROM artist WHERE no=s.artist_no) AS artist, (SELECT album FROM album WHERE no=album_no) AS album, (SELECT img_real FROM album WHERE no=album_no) AS album_img FROM song AS s where artist_no=#{artist_no} ORDER BY s.regdate DESC
